December Hi,' 1950
Hr. Burton Paulu
Radio Station KUGM
University of Minnesota
Kinne upoli ^Minnesota
D^ar Burton:
I just noticed that you are still listing Maryland
ilson as Radio Director for Alabama College, Montevallo
in the associate members of Region II* Maryland .tilson
has not been at tliis school for many years. The Director
for the last three years has been Ralph Sears and the
school is now known as Alabama College not Alabama College
for Women. Sorry I did not catch 'this before the new
directory came out.
It was good seeing you in Washington* Enjoyed
dormitory life with you*
Sincerely yours,
Graydon Atismus, Director
Hadio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUGA(FM)
